name: Princess Halloween Makeover
description:
Ever wanna become a star character in a horror movie? Or else a glamorous bride in a haunted castle? How about being the party queen in a Halloween rock party? All those dreams could come true right here, right now. This is a Dress-up plus Make-over game exclusively designed for the Halloween Season! Enjoy yourself in the Halloween world full of mystery and glamour!

*** Features ***
>> Various Themes: Everyday Life plus Grand Wedding plus Halloween Party, all that you wanted and all that you can’t imagine is here.
>> You’ll have many options to make-up a stunning look: foundation, hairstyle, eyecolor, eyebrows, eyeshadow, eyelashes and more
>> Once you’ve done the make-up, it’s time to match it with a whole package deal---Dress-up with all the outfits and accessories also with plenty of choices!
>> Now you can share your fabulous look with your friends, see if you can amaze them.
>> Truly take you to another world full of spookiness and wonder, don’t be scared and shine your way through!
